remarks.format: ## Examples 事务应用程序使用的一个示例配置文件，如下所示，可以是An example configuration file used by your transaction application can be as follows, `` `` `` `` `` `` 此示例指定事务的默认值。This example specifies the default values of a transaction. 具体而言，它设置以及负责协调本地启动的所有分布式的事务的分布式事务处理协调器 (MSDTC) 事务超时之前经过的默认时间的计算机名称。此外，它指定事务超时前，允许使用只能在计算机级别，这是最长时间进行修改的设置。Specifically, it sets the computer name of the Distributed Transaction Coordinator (MSDTC) that is responsible for coordinating all distributed transactions started locally, and the default time after which a transaction times out. In addition, it specifies a setting that can only be modified at the machine level, which is the maximum amount of time allowed before a transaction times out.
